#summary Business requests.

= Business requests =

Content:
  * [RequestsBusiness#Business_Get Business Get]

== Business Get ==
|| request URL || *(HTTP)* `/business/get/` || 
|| method || *GET* ||
|| description || request for [DatatypesBusiness Business object(s). Also used to search for businesses ||

*Prameters:*
|| *parameter* || *type* || *description* ||
|| `session_key` || String || Current User's Session Key (anonymous or authenticated) ||
|| _`ids`_  || `List<Long>` || Business ids list. CSV of IDs. ||
|| _`what`_ || `String` || Search phraze ||
|| _`where`_|| `String` || Search location ||
|| _`category`_ || `List<Long>` || List of ids of categories (to narrow search results) ||
|| _`page_number`_ || `Integer` || Page number of results (default and first page has number  1) ||
|| _`short`_ || `Boolean` || True if you are asking for Short versions of [DatatypesBusiness Business objects]. default is `false` ||

*Returns data:*

[DatatypesBusiness Business] structures in full or [DatatypesBusiness#Business_Short short form].

*Error codes (for HTTP code 200)*

|| *API CODE* || *meaning* ||
|| MSG_OK || successfuly searched requested businesses ||
|| ERR_ADDRESS_TRANSLATION || Google was unable to translate address into location. User's default location could be taken under consideration (thus results could be not empty). _Only if `where` parameter was present._||

*Note:*
  * Jeśli w tym zapytaniu pojawi się pole `ids` całe pytanie zostanie potraktowane jako pytanie o konkretne businessy, a nie zapytanie „z wyszukiwarki”. Stąd obecność pola `ids` wyklucza pozostałe pola poza `session_key` (nie mają one sensu).

  * Pole `short` jest opcjonalne. Nawet jeśli klient explicite poprosi o wersje skróconą może dostać postać pełną (i powinien ją poprawnie rozpoznać)
